title: stevennhansen
author: stevennhansen
content: Hey,I am selling a 20K email base of users who participated in NFT mint. Entries are: Twitter (@/Link) | Discord Login | Wallet Address BSC BEP-20| EmailThe price is $18501) What is the TATThe turnaround time is a couple of minutes.2) Can you show example?Yes, sure, I'll send some entries in .pdf, so you can check.3) How does it work?- Contact me in Telegram or By email- I'll send you the example of the table in .pdf- Send the payment- I will send the base in .csv right after the payment confirmed4) Payment methods.USDT, BUSD, SOL, BTC, ETH, MATIC, BNB or any other "well-known" crypto.Contact me: deuris1212@gmail.com or Telegram: t.me/al1ex2 (@al1ex2)

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I am curious how you got that database, hacked or stolen. Usually, this is a spam service and you are selling this database without the user's permission which isn't appreciated at all by crypto users. There are a lot of free databases of real crypto users and you can find the bounty section. So I don't see any reason to buy a database or mail list of crypto users.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on September 15, 2022, 06:18:13 PMI am curious how you got that database, hacked or stolen. Usually, this is a spam service and you are selling this database without the user's permission which isn't appreciated at all by crypto users. There are a lot of free databases of real crypto users and you can find the bounty section. So I don't see any reason to buy a database or mail list of crypto users. This is a breach of privacy and its not good for those interested to buy this database as it will mark their project spam and they will be reported, I usually marked emails that are coming to me without an unsubscribe button and without my permission to send me promotions or anything similar, OP deserves a flag for selling information without those user's permission in our country we have a very strict law on this, you will be fine and go to jail for selling information without user's permission, that is why we should be too careful participating on projects that are not compliant.
